overview: Yom HaShoah ordinarily takes place in person, often attended by hundreds of people from across the region. CET and the Nancy & David Wolf Holocaust & Humanity Center have partnered in 2021 to bring these remembrances to a wide audience in a 30-minute broadcast format, one that is particularly meaningful to the hundreds of survivors living in the Greater Cincinnati area today.
title: Yom HaShoah: Remembering for Tomorrow
